entry.title: sh13y/Musixmatch: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.
entry.content: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

entry.title: creasydude/crcrypt: CRCRYPT is a lightweight text encryption and decryption tool that uses the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm to securely encrypt and decrypt text. Fast and efficient, CRCRYPT provides a simple and reliable solution for protecting sensitive information.
entry.content: CRCRYPT is a lightweight text encryption and decryption tool that uses the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm to securely encrypt and decrypt text. Fast and efficient, CRCRYPT provides a simple and reliable solution for protecting sensitive information.

entry.title: D4C4N/EmilEmoji: 🎉 Emil Emoji - A Discord bot that announces newly added emojis in a user-specified channel in your server. Lightweight, easy to set up, and customizable. Perfect for keeping your community updated with the latest emotes! 🚀

entry.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
entry.content: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
